Verses.1: "Comfort, comfort My people," says your God.
Verses.2:
"Speak tenderly to Jerusalem,
and call out to her. Tell her that hardship is over,
that her guilt has been pardoned,
and she has received from the LORD's hand 
double for all her sins."
Verses.3:
A voice cries out:
"In the wilderness, prepare the way for the LORD.
Make straight a path in the desert for our God."
Verses.4:
Let every valley be listed up,
and every mountain and hill brought low.
Let uneven ground be made level,
and the rugged places a wide plain.
Verses.5:
Then the glory of the LORD will be revealed,
and all people will see it together,
for the mouth of the LORD has spoken.

Changes: 2024-01-30 - Paul Prins: Initial translation of verses 1-5.
